short_summary: The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) requires the provision and delivery of Driver’s License Readers.
description: The bid solicitation is being issued by SSC. The resulting contract will be used by SSC to provide shared services to the Royal Canadian Mounted Police. It is intended to result in the award of a contract for two years, plus two-one year irrevocable options allowing Canada to extend the term of the contract.
full_summary:
# Tender Announcement for Drivers License Readers for the Royal Canadian Mounted Police

## Announcement Title

English: Drivers License Readers for the Royal Canadian Mounted Police
French: Lecteurs de permis de conduire pour la Gendarmerie royale du Canada

## Reference Information

*   Reference Number: SSC-23-00024873:T
*   Solicitation Number: BPM019907/24873
*   Publication Date: December 15, 2023
*   Tender Closing Date: January 4, 2024 (14:00:00)
*   Expected Contract Start Date: None
*   Expected Contract End Date: None
*   Tender Status: Expired

## Contract Information

*   Contractor: Shared Services Canada
*   Contract Scope: The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) requires the provision and delivery of drivers' license readers.
*   Delivered locations: Multiple Locations across Canada
*   Delivery Date: 30 federal government working days from contract award.
*   Security Requirements: N/A
*   Comprehensive Land Claim Agreements (CLCA): N/A

## Notice and Solicitation

*   This is a request for proposal under the Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA) and other signed international trade agreements.
*   Interested parties can submit their bids through the official tender portal: [https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login](https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login) (English) or [https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/fr/usr/login](https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/fr/usr/login) (French).
*   Documents are available in both official languages.

## Contact Information

*   Brian Humphries
    Senior Procurement Officer
    Shared Services Canada
    400 Cooper St, 6th floor, Ottawa, Ontario, K2P 2N1
    Tél. (613) 296-6951
